overview: Yeah, this real-life badboy is a bitch to work with - he came very close to punching my lights out during the Jayden Holloway Da Vinci Load 2: Electric Twinkaloo shoot - but he's a fucking sex-machine dynamo on film, there's no denying that. The horny motherfucker is like a fucking animal in heat, with a fat cock and an insatiable libido. This is how it all started, the first footage ever shot of this rising star - when he called himself Phoenix and I named him Sebastian Young. It features reedited and remastered versions of the best of Sebastian Young from PZP Productions' movies. In addition, there's never-before-seen footage, outtakes and temper tantrums.
tagline: This director's re-cut compilation film is dedicated to those people who hate plot-driven porn with dialogue, and only want the raw sex.
title: Sebastian Young Reduxxx
